channel.title: IF Answers - Recent questions tagged loading

item.title: Endless Loading [Quest]
item.description: I pressed 'Edit Game', as usual, expecting for the editor to pop up again. It did, but it was completely blank and grayed out, with a big "Loading . . . " in the middle. I can't work on it at all; I tried waiting, refreshing, re-logging, and even shutting off my computer, yet nothing will work. It still says "Loading . . ." right now, how do I get my project back?
